price: 71. Waxaa lagula kor wareegi xeedhooyin dahab ah iyo koobab, waxayna ka heli (Jannada) waxay doonaan nafahooda,  indhuhuna ku raaxaysan, idinkoo dhexdeeda ku waadhi.
arabic: يُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِصِحَافٖ مِّن ذَهَبٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖۖ وَفِيهَا مَا تَشۡتَهِيهِ ٱلۡأَنفُسُ وَتَلَذُّ ٱلۡأَعۡيُنُۖ وَأَنتُمۡ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yuṭāfu ʿalayhim biṣiḥāfin min dhahabin wa-akwābin wafīhā mā tashtahīhi al-anfusu wataladhu al-aʿyunu wa-antum fīhā khālidūna
